WorkPlace.Name: VOS ApS
WorkPlace.Description: V.O.S ‘Vision of Scandinavia’ is one of the leading tour operators in Scandinavia and well known around the world, with 20 years of experience specializing in customized leisure group round-trips and FIT itineraries to Scandinavia, Iceland, the Baltics and Poland.

HiringOrg.OrganizationDescription: V.O.S ‘Vision of Scandinavia’ is one of the leading tour operators in Scandinavia and well known around the world, with 20 years of experience specializing in customized leisure group round-trips and FIT itineraries to Scandinavia, Iceland, the Baltics and Poland.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Do you have a keen eye in finance and bookkeeping and an excellent multi-tasker? Do you thrive in an internationally dynamic environment? Are you self-motivated and do you take pride in doing a good job? Then maybe the position of Accountant is right for you.

As an Accountant in V.O.S Destination Management, you will be part of our team, which currently consists of 2 employees. You will be working closely with our Sales & Operations team and your daily tasks will primarily be within Business Central, Navidoc and our internal booking system.

 
RESPONSIBILITIES
- Verifying, processing, and posting of incoming transactions – payments received from customers.
- Verifying, processing, and posting outgoing transactions – payments to suppliers.
- Identifying & resolving discrepancies between accounting systems & projects including internal reminders to sales & operations as well as outgoing reminders to customers.  
- Ongoing Project and account reconciliations.
- Ad hoc tasks.

REQUIRED SKILLS & EXPERIENCE
- You have min. 2 years of experience within finance/bookkeeping or similar position.
- You have a relevant accounting education.
- You preferably have previous experience working with Business Central as well as Navidoc.
- You are an experienced user of Office, particularly Excel.
- You can communicate in English in both writing and speech.
- You are social and outgoing and have a service-minded attitude.
- You are a problem-solver and are comfortable with working independently.
- Your work methodology is structured, and you are detail-oriented.
- You are curious and interested in sharing knowledge within the team.
- You like to be part of an informal and energetic environment, and you can easily adapt.
- We are looking for self-motivated people with a confident approach. You would need aptitude to work under pressure and be flexible to work an extended schedule during the high season with no holiday from June-July. 

WHAT WE OFFER
Open, informal and multinational working environment
Flexible working hours outside of peak seasons
High responsibility and excellent career possibilities
A self-driven and high-performance culture

In your application please include:
- When you would be able to start
- Salary expectations
- Why you would be perfect for us!
